00029 #ifndef SIMPLELINEARELLIPTICSOLVER_HPP_
00030 #define SIMPLELINEARELLIPTICSOLVER_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "AbstractAssemblerSolverHybrid.hpp"
00033 #include "AbstractStaticLinearPdeSolver.hpp"
00034 #include "AbstractLinearEllipticPde.hpp"
00035 
00041 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00042 class SimpleLinearEllipticSolver
00043     : public AbstractAssemblerSolverHybrid<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, 1, NORMAL>,
00044       public AbstractStaticLinearPdeSolver<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, 1>
00045 {
00046 protected:
00047 
00049     AbstractLinearEllipticPde<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* mpEllipticPde;
00050 
00063     virtual c_matrix<double, 1*(ELEMENT_DIM+1), 1*(ELEMENT_DIM+1)> ComputeMatrixTerm(
00064         c_vector<double, ELEMENT_DIM+1>& rPhi,
00065         c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, ELEMENT_DIM+1>& rGradPhi,
00066         ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rX,
00067         c_vector<double,1>& rU,
00068         c_matrix<double,1,SPACE_DIM>& rGradU,
00069         Element<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pElement);
00070 
00082     virtual c_vector<double,1*(ELEMENT_DIM+1)> ComputeVectorTerm(
00083         c_vector<double, ELEMENT_DIM+1>& rPhi,
00084         c_matrix<double, SPACE_DIM, ELEMENT_DIM+1>& rGradPhi,
00085         ChastePoint<SPACE_DIM>& rX,
00086         c_vector<double,1>& rU,
00087         c_matrix<double,1,SPACE_DIM>& rGradU,
00088         Element<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pElement);
00089 
00090 
00091     // Note: does not have to provide a ComputeVectorSurfaceTerm for surface integrals,
00092     // the parent AbstractAssemblerSolverHybrid assumes natural Neumann BCs and uses a
00093     // NaturalNeumannSurfaceTermAssembler for assembling this part of the vector.
00094 
00095 
00096 
00105     void SetupLinearSystem(Vec currentSolution, bool computeMatrix)
00106     {
00107         SetupGivenLinearSystem(currentSolution, computeMatrix, this->mpLinearSystem);
00108     }
00109 
00110 public:
00111 
00120     SimpleLinearEllipticSolver(AbstractTetrahedralMesh<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pMesh,
00121                                AbstractLinearEllipticPde<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pPde,
00122                                BoundaryConditionsContainer<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM,1>* pBoundaryConditions,
00123                                unsigned numQuadPoints = 2);
00124 
00131     void InitialiseForSolve(Vec initialSolution = NULL);
00132 };
